title: What are some mind blowing homemade technology that most people don’t know ? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are technology geniuses secretly living among us everyday. A lot of people make their own technology at home in their garage. One of my favourites is an actual HULK BUSTER from the Marvel Movie Avengers 2. Someone built a moving and functioning replica of the giant robot in their own garage. His name is James Bruton, and that is The link to his amazing channel. Another cool YouTube channel is AWE me. it is about these guys that make their own inventions based on comic and movie characters. They made their own batman utility belt and their own captain America shield. Here is the link: DIY Prop Shop - YouTube these are just some fun YouTube channels starring real geniuses
